name: ttgbas
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ (Base ` c2)=(Base ` c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ (Base ` c2)=(Base ` c1)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(nat1))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)
-| wbr(nat1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))
body.pretty:
⊢ (Base ` c2)=(Base ` c1)
⊣ c1 =(toTG ` c2)
⊣ Base = Slot(1)
⊣ 1 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 1[<]cdc(1, 6)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wceq(cbs, cslot(nat1))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)
-| wbr(nat1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(toTG ` c2)
⊣ Base = Slot(1)
⊣ 1 ∈ ℕ
⊣ 1[<]cdc(1, 6)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)
-| wbr(nat1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))

body.origin:
|- wbr(nat1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)
-| wcel(nat6, cn0)
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wbr(nat1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)
-| wcel(nat6, cn0)
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wbr(nat1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wcel(nat6, cn0)
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wbr(nat1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wcel(nat1, cn0)
-| wbr(nat1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wbr(nat1, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(toTG ` c2)
⊣ 1[<]cdc(1, 0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)

comment: The base set of a subcomplex Hilbert space augmented with betweenness. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Mar-2019.)
